website_summaries.verdict: This protein-rich meal topper infuses your dog's meal with quality chicken and healthy plant-based antioxidants. Added probiotics aid your pooch's digestion.
pros: This topper is 95 percent chicken, from birds that are hormone and antibiotic free
Meat is mixed with organic fruits and vegetables that deliver a dose of antioxidants
Freeze dried texture means it's easy to chew
Some use this food as snacks or training treats
cons: This brand may experience quality control challenges from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Piece of plastic found inside kibble!
customer_reviews.text: I found a piece of green plastic embedded in a piece of kibble in this mixer. I'm lucky that I saw it sticking out of the kibble before I fed it to my dog. I think it's disgraceful that a company would allow toxic plastic to be added to "raw" dog food. I've reached out to the company but have had no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst food I've given to my furbabies
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst food I've given to my furbabies !! Within a week , my baby was sick and borderline pancreatic!!! It's so overloaded on fat ... This $40 tiny bag of food cost me $500 , 2 sleepless nights not to mention my baby's discomfort!!!!
customer_reviews.author: labluvr2329

customer_reviews.title: Product lacking lot and expiration information- won't order again
customer_reviews.text: I usually like this product, but this package came with no lot number and no expiration date. Without that I don't know whether it is safe for my pet or not. That is a lot to pay for a suspect product. This is the second package I ordered that has lacked the information. I probably will not order this from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Expired 4 Months Ago
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product, especially for being on a today's deal, but the package I received from the order I placed on 10/12/19 actually expired over 4 months ago on 6/5/19. That wasn't shown or indicated at all in the item's description, and don't think it would have even been legal, but not sure.
customer_reviews.author: S.Friend

customer_reviews.title: My dog got sick
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving our dog Stella & Chewy's Turkey and Chicken to sprinkle on her dried food for five months. We then tried the beef. We opened the beef and sprinkled it over her late afternoon meal. I can't honestly say it was the beef, but the next day she vomited three times. The vet told us to lay off the beef.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Expires food being sold
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on August 1st. I love giving these toppers to my dogs but this time, my dogs were getting sick and threw up a couple of times so I stopped. I just pulled it out of the cabinet so I could throw it away and noticed that the expiration date was 6/23/18. Why are you selling product that has already been expired almost 2 months????
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Both dogs loved the taste and would readily eat this up when ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this based on the positive reviews and in an attempt to phase in raw food diet for two dogs. Both dogs loved the taste and would readily eat this up when hydrated with a bit of water. The problem is that both dogs ended up with upset stomachs. I thought this was because this was new in their diets, so ordered a second bag to mix in to their current kibble. The diarrhea continued and one of the dogs ended up vomiting (bright green bits were thrown up) after the second day of mixing this in. Threw out the rest of the second bag unfortunately. This might just be my dogs, but I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: jubilee

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packing = Pulverized Priduct
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but it was shipped in a mailing envelope and almost half of the contents were powder upon arrival. It’s fine if you are mixing with food, but we use it as a high value treat when training our dog, and had to go and purchase it again at a local pet store. Possibly it is a manufacturing issue, but as I’ve never had this problem buying it from a shop, I’d say it was more likely a poor choice of packing. Contents are actually fragile!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Order was recieved with a current expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and and my dog loved it. Then she stopped eating. Checked resources and found out there was a RECALL. My dog sensed it before I did! She has not eaten for 3 days. Now I have to taking her to the Vet today as an emergency Visit, and then go purchase more Dog food and try out yet another brand.. **** ALSO, this was the first time to order it the food on line and after her refusal to eat, I checked the EXPIRATION date and it a week away from being expired, which is NOT acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: BGWDesigns

customer_reviews.title: My Stella loves this food with her name on it! ;-)
customer_reviews.text: My Stella loves this food with her name on it! ;-) I add it to her Zignature kibble food as a extra source of nutrition that I can trust! It stinks up the house, but not for long, because she is a fast eater and she LOVES this stuff! She has allergies to chicken and rice so this works well with her current diet! She was a rescue dog and came to us underweight, happy to say she has gained some weight and looks great! She has stopped sneezing and itching herself. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: LindaLaLaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DO IT
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are so picky. I’m picky. They’re our babies and we only want them to eat the best. We have been using a soft food meat topper for months that hasn’t had them “excited” to eat like it once did. My two pups eat 1/3 cup twice a day of their normal dry kibble and I just crumble one piece on top of their food and they go nuts. They won’t let me go one minute past meal time without getting in my face and reminding me what time it is. Send help because they now know these are stored up on the counter and just constantly sit there while mean mugging me. SOS
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of food dust instead of chunks.
customer_reviews.text: The small clear window on the bag is a couple of inches above the bottom of the bag so it looks like the food is chunks of chow. The last bag that I got had a high percentage of the food in a dust like consistency. Also sometimes you get a measuring cup and sometimes you don't. My Jack Russel likes the chucks but leaves the dust as goo in the bottom of her dish. For the price there ought to be better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Nominatus

customer_reviews.title: Safe Healthy Way to Add Raw to my dog's diets
customer_reviews.text: I breed teacup schnauzer maltese puppies and all my dogs and puppies love this topper...and so do I because it's a healthy way to add raw to their diet, without the hassle of going to the butcher. I have 6 dogs and they love these toppers. Wish they were a little more affordable, but health is the price we pay. My dogs give these 5 paws up! Karen Russell Teacup Schnauzer Maltese Puppies and Healthy Life Advisors
customer_reviews.author: Karen Russell

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my dogs training!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product for picky pups. My training center uses these as rewards for training so I purchased a pack. I really think this product helped my dog pay a lot more attention in training class. So much so that we flew through 2 obedience classes and she just earned her Canine Good Citizenship certificate. I really wish they made smaller pieces though. I have to tear these into bit size pieces as my dog is only 9 lbs. The larger size is great for bigger pups, but it would be awesome if they made them smaller for training. Tearing them into smaller pieces makes them crumble sometimes. Still, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelsa

customer_reviews.title: May start searching for a different brand..
customer_reviews.text: These bags are hit or miss with quality.. seems that way anyways. Whatever it is it's not consistent. These were super hard this go round. I like to break them into a crumble over my dog's food but that's not happening with this batch. The centers are dark too which hasn't happened before. Overall it's consistently a gamble with these overall.
customer_reviews.author: kg1

customer_reviews.title: 😈Tommy🐾 says Yup it’s Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and found that this product would suffice. My Whippet is very important to us. He is our puppy son so he gets only the absolute best money can buy. I used it as a dressing on his Canine Caviar holistic kibble. I added filtered water over the freeze dried morsels and then made him wait until it softened and soaked up the moisture. It was tough making him wait, when time was up he enjoyed every bite. He was completely satisfied and didn’t even try and bug us when we sat down and ate our dinner. It’s a hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tayloranne 13

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, but be careful opening the bag.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE the product. I'm removing 1 star because THIS particular bag (and I've purchased several) did not have a scoop and there's a weird pull tag for "easy opening" which...I pulled, it ripped off immediately and I slammed a knuckle against the wall. I cut the bag open, seemingly above the closure...but a bit of the closure was cut and was only attached to 1 side. I had to pour the contents into a 1 gallon storage bag...that's when I discovered there was no scoop. Fortunately, I still had the scoop from the previous bag.
customer_reviews.author: Marj Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch of dog food!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on subscription and the first bag was great however after the first feeding of the second bag my dog had an infestation of round worms. I dewormed her but worms continued. I stopped the Stella food and switched to Blue. The worms stopped after the first feeding. I gave her the Stella brand and worms came back. I knew it was the Stella raw chicken. I contacted Amazon and they gave me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work as a Meal Mixer for my Husky
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this as a meal mixer for my very stubborn husky. Given the price, and based on other reviews, I was expecting a MIRACLE. That my stubborn husky would FINALLY eat her kibble instead of starving herself for days waiting for treats. My husky liked these... but it did nothing to make her actually eat her kibble. Instead, and because these come in large clumps, she was able to pick out the Chewy's and ignore all the rest. That being said, they are fine as treats. My husky likes them and I like the raw and natural aspect of them. But for the price, she can do the same with a tub of freeze-dried liver.
customer_reviews.author: JAX

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn't approve, went back to Chicken
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the Chicken version in the past and my dog really likes it. I bought the Turkey kind of by mistake, but thought it wouldn't be an issue. How different can they be? Well, the dog doesn't like it! I had to add more things to a meal mixer which is there to make the dry food more enjoyable... Ended up buying the Chicken Superblends also by S&C and throwing this one away... She's very happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy N.

customer_reviews.title: Stella & Chewy's Freeze-Dried Raw Stella's Super Beef Meal Mixers Grain-Free Dog Food Topper
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for some time to use with older dogs that suddenly decided they were picky eaters. This product did the trick. However the product I just received from Amazon was horrible. The chicken nuggets were hard as rocks and had to crush them before feeding to my dogs because they had difficulty chewing them. Usually can crush with fingers, but this time ended up cutting them up with very sharp garden cutters. Expiration Date: BEST IF USED BY NOV 30/2021.
customer_reviews.author: TerryS

customer_reviews.title: Great source of extra nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cat to get extra nutrition. I have a 10 month old kitten who is a little of a bully when it comes to food, so I give these to my other cat as a special treat. He goes crazy as soon as he hears the drawer open! My only reason for not giving 5 stars is I wish it had better packaging. The pieces are very soft and quite a bit was smashed and powdery. A canister or something would be better packaging to avoid the waste. I still used the powder by adding a couple drops of water to it, but it's not as convenient. I just ordered my 2nd bag.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper coolmom3

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed chihuahua loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: 3 lb Chihuahua loves this food! She is a finicky eater but loves freeze dried food! I have tried such a variety of freeze dried foods in hopes of finding one brand she will eat consistently. This is the product!! She has been eating it for a week twice every day and licking her bowl clean. I will update the review in the near future based on the continued success of the product! But I have already ordered the food again!
customer_reviews.author: Amoore

customer_reviews.title: its great for pets who have sensative tummies
customer_reviews.text: Our dog just loves this stuff. We mix it with her dry kibble. Another advantage is that since we started using this, she has so many fewer of the "stinkies" too commonly associated with pugs. A huge plus. In addition, its great for pets who have sensative tummies. Ours is prone to throw up a lot of different foods, but is great with this. We have been giving it to her for about 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: harley

customer_reviews.title: The food contains nothing but meat, ground bone and organs and has no strange additives.
customer_reviews.text: My cat was already eating S&C for cats, so I was familiar with their freeze-dried raw food. My dog had been diagnosed with a heart condition and had to change foods. She really didn't care for the food so I tried sprinkling the mix-ins on her food. Worked like a charm! That did the trick. She loves it. These freeze-dried foods must be reconstituted with water. Do not feed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: This Stella and Chewy product is as I expected. I order it a lot for my dog. There were no shipping issues and it is the same as I would get in a store. These pieces are great to crumble up and mix with food or to give as a treat. My pup loves them. They do make your fingers smell a tiny bit but definitely don't stink up the house. I've been giving them to my dog for years now. It's a great product for a picky eater since you can pick different proteins.
customer_reviews.author: CShil

customer_reviews.title: yummy dog food topper
customer_reviews.text: when we first got our puppy, he was so shy and nervous he was not eating (we served him "raw beef sliders" ) he would eat 1/2 and walk away. I think he was just nervous getting use to being in a new home - but, we wanted him to get his full nourishment by eating his meals completely. One of the sales people at a specialty dog food and supply store recommended "Stella & Chewys" I crush one up on top of his sliders and he eats like a little fiend. these are great - we just use them as a topper to get him started.......
customer_reviews.author: size 4 to 6

customer_reviews.title: This is literally a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog (half Cocker Spaniel and half Chihuahua) was a picky eater, so, over the past year we'd literally tried every single brand of dog food and she literally hated all of them. And then, a friend told me about this meal mixer, OMG, it's a total game changer, now she eats two square meals a day and always licks the bowl clean. Thank you, Stella & Chewy. Oh, I got a question about subscribing for automatic delivery, so far my dog has tried turkey and duck, I would like to give her chicken next and then beef, but how do I inform Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: WeLovePhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work (as well) for my dog
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to other Stella & Chewy products, this one is so so. My dog eats the toppers right of the top eats maybe one or two bites of her dry food and then she's done. The dust type product I can mix in throughout her dry food and she will eat it right away leave a little and eat the rest in a few hours. Luckily I can smash this product into dust easily. Only this bag is not as convenient as the pour style ones of the dust product. one thing that was annoying is the zipper came broken so I had to transfer this into something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mkeshav

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these. I have 2 mutts and a basset hound. I feed them merrick brand dry and mix in a handful with dry food. The basset hound is the pickiest eater ive ever had. You would think her being a hound that wouldnt be the case but it is. And she approves... I didnt think the larger golden retriever mix was but a spontaneous trip with my husband proved she is, he tried to feed her pedigree and she stared at him like she was disappointed 😂. But she loves this. My little boy australian shephard mix does a little dance when he sees this bag. He is not picky at all tho.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great, but expensive for the oz
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old pug loves stella and chewy's freeze dried patties, so we thought this would be an easy mix-in for his food when we aren't using those. We hoped they'd be cheaper and last longer than buying the patties, but in the end, i think breaking up the patties are a better deal. We aren't buying these anymore, but are still a Stella's customer!
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Crushed bags and tummy troubles
customer_reviews.text: We originally found the freeze dried raw meal mixers at a local pet store, bought a bag to mix in with our two dogs meals once a day and they loved them. I saw they were on Amazon, and started ordering from here. The last two bags we have received have been mostly powder and arrive crushed and smooshed. Over the last few weeks, our youngest dog has started having odd vowel movements and can no longer sleep through the night without needing to go out to potty - very odd for her. So, today we are removing the freeze dried from her dinner to see if it makes a difference. Disappointed in the delivery and quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: without question, the best dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves Stella and Chewy's -- more than any other dog food we've ever tried. Additionally, it makes his stools firmer, which is appreciated if he ever has an accident in the house. The mixers are $.02 per ounce more expensive than the regular Stella and Chewy's food, but to me that minuscule amount is worth it not to have to break up the patties to mix in with kibble. Stella and Chewy's is more expensive, but it's more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy goodness
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahuas and I love this. Switched to this and primal from years of Darwin’s raw and they have no issues and absolutely devour. Only thing I would change is the form of the product. It isn’t quickly water soluble and more difficult to break down than Primal, so I have to food process the entire bag upon opening and then scoop and add water to feed. Not adding water leads to constipation, choking hazard and potential future kidney issues so that’s not an option. Glad I figured that all out because they love it, and I live having two brands to bounce back and forth from.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Stella & Chewy's got my girl eating, however, not the bags from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My girl is so, so fussy!! She refuses her home cooked meals including the meat, yes, the meat! But this Stella & Chewy's Turkey has been a God Send! I bought it at our local boutique & she went nuts over it!! I then bought it from the local pet store & same thing. However, i bought it off Amazon & she's not too into it. The dates are fine. I bought 4 bags. Opened 2 so far & both she's just not into. I've been throwing some of her portions away. I'm wondering if it's an Amazon storage thing?
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Raw is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality was good but man, this is EXPENSIVE, if you check the price per pound. I mean, I’ve been doing freeze dried diet for a while now, but per unit weight, this is still costly compared to other brands. I’ve switched mostly to Honest Kitchen and Trudog, but just mix in sone Stella’s because some others are pasty and not formed nuggets... just so he can get a change in texture. There’s definitely a change in health and vitality when my dog consumes raw diet.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: The dog food was not whole it was mostly very small pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the Topper for my dogs several times and they have enjoyed it. The last two bags I bought it looks like the dog food was ground up. Not many whole pieces for then to chew it was more like sand. I was very disappointed in how the bags came. My dogs didn't have anything to chew since it was like sand. This food is expensive and I will now have to find another company to provide their freeze dried raw food. There needs to be some type if quality control before you ship to your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN'T GO WRONG WITH STELLA & CHEWY!
customer_reviews.text: My little spoiled Shih Tzu, Rocky, loves Stella and Chewy Meal Mixers...add it to his kibble and he's sure eat it all. Of course I mix the kibble with a little Cesar Select, throw on the S&C meal mix and he loves it. He also loves the Stella and Chewy Wild Weenies Dog Treats. This brand is high priced, for sure, but whatever Rocky wants, Rocky gets!
customer_reviews.author: Elayne Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Bravo to Stella & Chewy's dog food topper
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it! I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw her eat the food! She's a picky eater and also eats Ultamino suggested by a vet for a dog who has food sensitivities. A friend suggested I try it since her dog is also a picky eater. I bought a small bag in case, did some research online and now I'm back to order more. I'm very happy that my fur baby loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay product  but  lamb is  excellent
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that when I opened the packaging the product smelled fishy, and my dog didn't gulp it up like the lamb. If I don't see that she likes it in the next couple of days I will ask for a replacement with the lamb. This product is good but pricey. Let's say I really like the lamb better
customer_reviews.author: BashorunJ

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video and then gave this product a try on my three dogs as a mixture in their regular food. Well, my pups love these beaver brains and rabbit feet. It is simple that dogs are attracted to things we humans may consider as gross and they will eat some real icky-poo things. I have a problem with the pricing of this food as good for your dog means bad for your wallet. Make this product more affordable and let all dogs eat some chicken lips. Give us a break...Please!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs just love this. I crumble this in with their canned food to add nutrition and enthusiasm. My senior dog requires medicine mixed in her food, so I need her to eat it all. No problem with this in there! Also, the pellet shape is handy for smooshing a few of them into the ends of a Kong bone to keep her busy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Terrible Fish Smell
customer_reviews.text: I love all Stella/chewy products, but wanted to give this 4 stars so everyone could be very aware that the SEAFOOD flavor of the meal mixers smells like actual trash. I expected it to be a strong fish scent, but man it's lethal. Like a diaper wrapped in salmon skin sprinkled with dirty sock. Definitely recommend opening the bag outside to serve. Otherwise - great quality to introduce some raw nutrition into your dogs kibble-only diet.
customer_reviews.author: ZL

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog happy
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog who hates to eat dry dog food. I saw an ad on FB for this food. I brought the smallest bag to try to see if I added some of this chicken flavored to the dry dog food if my dog would eat. Success no matter which dry food I add it to my dog eat it. Since I am adding it to dry food it is not costly. Happy dog happy owner
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the same item I ordered last tim but ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same item I ordered last tim but this package is changed, has two less scoops food and is the same price!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy bennett

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves These
customer_reviews.text: The product looks a little bit like cardboard packing-peanuts, but they actually smell like food and I assume they taste good because my dog loves them. We use them in puzzle games or balls because they're an extra treat with a good scent. The package will tell you how to use them as meal toppers or to rehydrate for raw food feeding, but we're just in that world. My dog, a two year old AmStaf has a very finicky stomach with new foods, but had no issues with these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: hit or miss with shipment
customer_reviews.text: These are hit or miss. I bought the beef flavor a few months ago and the texture was REALLY dry and tough. I bought it again a few days ago and instead the texture is softer..almost like if the first bag I ordered had expired or gone bad or been exposed to too much air.
customer_reviews.author: JRodTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: FRESHNESS
customer_reviews.text: WE ARE VERY UPSET. THIS IS THE 2ND TIME THAT WE ORDER THIS PRODUCT FROM AMAZON AND THE DOGS GET SICK,. WE STOPPED FOR A WHILE AND BOUGHT THE FOOD FROM A FAMOUS DOG BAR IN MIAMI BEACH BUT IT'S TOO FAR SO WE STARTED ORDERING AGAIN FROM AMAZON. OUR DOGS VOMIT FOR 3 DAYS. WE STOPPED GAVE THEM FRESH CHICKEN AND THEY DID NOT VOMIT FOR 3 DAYS. TODAY THE CHICKEN FINISHED AND WE GAVE THEM THIS FOOD AGAIN AND AGAIN THEY VOMIT!!! THIS IS RIDICULOUS AND UNACCEPTABLE. WE ARE DONE WITH STELLA
customer_reviews.author: Iris A Arden

customer_reviews.title: Talk about easy....
customer_reviews.text: So easy to scoop a few nuggets on top of my dog's kibble and provide him with the benefits of raw meat. I first tried a small bag of the beef flavor and Benny was enthusiastic. I then bought the larger bag of the chicken and he's pretty happy with that as well. This food is pricey, but you can add just one scoop daily to your small dog's kibble. These larger bags hold 40 scoops of food. No muss, no fuss. It's easier and faster than the brands that require rehydration and time for absorption.
customer_reviews.author: foggySFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, the bag was over 50% powder :-(
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a smaller bag at a local store, I decided to order a larger quantity via Amazon. Unfortunately, the bag was half powder. Shipping box was intact. We use these as snacks throughout the day, as our one dog gets sick with an empty stomach, so it's not going to be able to be used for that. Disappointing. I'll just sprinkle the crushed bits on top of our dogs' food and not buy the larger bag online anymore. I put some of the product in a clear ziplock to more easily show how much was just powder.
customer_reviews.author: V M T

customer_reviews.title: They will overeat!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older small dog that needs some enticement to eat and was losing weight. She lives this and has maintained her weight for the last few months since we started this and the duck duck goose patties on her kibble. She’s allergic to chicken so we don’t feed the Stella and chewy kibble. My other dog takes full advantage of her feeding schedule and added a bit around his waist. We have to ration him.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: He has liked other foods but this is the first food in ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is extremely finicky and spoiled and he LOVES this food. He has liked other foods but this is the first food in which he eats all of it at every single meal. He never leaves a morsel behind. He also seems to be doing well stomach-wise and I am really happy I found this. I do not love the smell but I am definitely sticking to this. I switched from Blue Buffalo after learning that they test on animals.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Was stale and not fresh, smelled bad and cause tummy upset for my pet
customer_reviews.text: We got a stale product. It is all bad by the time we received it. It was moist and smelled weird. Our dog had one meal and puked all over because of an upset tummy. I am unable to return this product but would like a refund for this one as I cannot use this product and the entire packet has gone waste. The chicken meal we ordered was fine but this one was bad quality
customer_reviews.author: chhavi

customer_reviews.title: My dude loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Man my dude loves these. If I leave them whole he will pick them out of his food. I also give as snacks. He watches me pull his food out of the cabinet. Doesn't move. Then I grab this bag, like a light switch just turned on. He is ready to eat. On my first dozen bags or so. He hasn't turned down any flavor but I think he likes the super beef more. I find the smell rather pleasing. Strange I know but it just smells good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Attaway

customer_reviews.title: My dog vomited soon after eating this, for at ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog vomited soon after eating this, for at least three times! I won't let him eat it again. I guess this food is not suitable for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Yixuan Wu

customer_reviews.title: My last 2 orders of this products arrived very dry ...
customer_reviews.text: My last 2 orders of this products arrived very dry and likely out of date. The nuggets were as hard as rocks and difficult to mix in the dogs other food. I will have to find a different vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PS Shep

customer_reviews.title: my stuborn bullydog actually walks for these things!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a "I will do what I want to do" bulldog, but when she sees that I am breaking out these babys she actually halls her round butt right to me. she loves them so much. I use them as treats instead of adding to her food. she is very picky when it comes to dog treats. I waisted a lot of money on different treats until I found stella and chewy's. love that they are real natural and raw, no fillers or biproducts. I give this two paws up!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H

customer_reviews.title: My pup didn’t even smell it, just started eating it fast. LOL
customer_reviews.text: I have a new Westie. And I have to coax him to eat. I took out the lamb and he didn’t even know sit for me to break it up for him, he just started eating, then The cat wanted some. He ate some too. Wonderful, I’ll keep a look out for pieces of plastic. The one thing , it IS expensive. Bigger bag would be better.,Like Dr. Marty’s bag size, I feed Kobe that too. His was only $29.00 for $ 16oz bag. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tina Presley

customer_reviews.title: Would not eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs, one is a very picky eater and the other one will eat almost anything and neither one of my dogs would eat this dog food! On to the next one. Sure wish amazon would carry Dr Marty's food. My dogs love that but it is so expensive I can't afford it.
customer_reviews.author: CyndiG

customer_reviews.title: Finally my old dog is eating!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14-year-old terrier mix and although he is in very good shape he has always been the world’s fussiest eater. Recently he has turned down every topping I put on his kibble. He has said no to cooked chopped steak, he has said no to braised chicken, and Then I discovered this product. I take 6 to 8 of the nuggets and shred them over his kibble in little piecesand he eats it right down. Dog gravy didn’t work as he hates wet food. My vet is happy because he has stopped losing weight. Yay!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves these
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was way too much, but they last a long time, I put it in a dog toy specifically designed to challenge my puppy to figure out how to get them out. They are freeze-dried so I'm thinking the nutrition is great. I'm not fond of the smell, it's not a strong odor, but it just doesn't look like anything I'd want to eat, but it's for my pup and he LOVES them. And he is PICKY.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Loving Amazon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: We have so many issues when products are delivered by other sources, especially USPS. No one delivers to our door, even though we specify that, but when Amazon delivers, it all works good. They read the instructions. Our dog food which our fur baby just loves (tummy issues) has been like sawdust because of how it is packed, managed etc. Yesterday Amazon delivered our Stella and Chewys Chicken...it was PERFECT....It can be done, you just need to hire the right people, and use delivery systems that will work with your customers. Keep up the Amazon delivery PLEASE....it works, and you'll get way fewer returns. Thank you Stella and Chewy for using Amazon delivery!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Storm Forbes

customer_reviews.title: POMERANIAN LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy my SUPER FINICKY Pomeranian the Steve's Brand of dehydrated Turkey but thought I would give these a try because they had them in Lamb which in real meat is her absolute favorite. I cut some up for her and put them on the floor and I could NOT BELIEVE it, she devoured them and when I looked at the bowl it was empty which was a TOTAL surprise. She loves Lamb and I will be back for more. On a special note, I refilled her bowl and the darn cat devoured it faster than she did!!! Kitty's love these too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LyndaZP

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food and these little nuggets are very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding Stella to my Chihuahua since she was a pup. My vet agrees that this is top quality food and my dog’s bloodwork reflects her healthy status. What’s so nice about these meal mixers is you can easily change from one flavor to another over several days, making it an easy adjustment for your dog. Highly recommend this and the patties – any flavor – it’s all good!
customer_reviews.author: chi-love

customer_reviews.title: MealMixers Crumby
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been getting this product for several months, and something has happened to the product quality. This month my 2 bags are filled with a large quantity of crumbs. I believe this affects the product quality! This is costly freeze dried salmon and cod from Stella and Chewy, a normally very high quality product. What’s happening to this product? And it is not smashed into a too small box! I checked that out! Help!
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: My Newfoundland is pretty picky about his kibble. I was giving him wet food mixed in, but he needed to go on a diet and cut out the wet food. He didn't want to eat just kibble after that... until I got this. Both my Newf and my Chihuahua go crazy over this stuff. I just crumble a few of these on their food and they go nuts devouring everything. It is healthy, natural, and low calorie. If you use it like I do, a bag will last a long time. They have tried chicken and lamb and love them both. I will say though that the chicken crumbles easier than lamb.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters this is for you
customer_reviews.text: One of my pups is on meds to help with leg recovery and the side effects unfortunately include deterring appetite. I tried rice, chicken broth, bread, and turkey sandwich meat (this last one can get expensive), and while they worked they didn’t work long term. THIS stuff she loves! I put 2-4 pieces at the bottom of her bowl, top with her regular food, and she eats it all no problem. Another added benefit is the bag comes with a good bit of “crumbs” or finely crushed pieces you can sprinkle all throughout the food, if you want to make sure they aren’t hunting the topper pieces and not eating their actual food.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: The only thing my picky pup will eat
customer_reviews.text: I rescued Miles, a ~9 month old miniature dachshund, in January. He was so underfed we could see all his little ribs. We have tried 3 different dry foods, multiple different canned foods, & 1 powder mixer. He was not interested in any of them, until this stuff came along. Now I just give him a 1/2 cup of dry food (we use blue mountain red meat puppy) and I crumble 3-4 kibbles of this stuff on top twice a day and he eats it all. It’s expensive but I highly recommend! You can stretch it pretty far by using it as a meal mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Bow WOW
customer_reviews.text: My 2, 10-month old puppies ADORE this - in every single flavor. It's a bit pricey, but so is healthy human food. At least I know I'm taking good care of them - after all, you are what you eat. My puppies gobble their food down when this is mixed in with it. In between deliveries, when I run out of their freeze dried food, they give me the stink eye when I feed them. haha (sorry about the Bow WOW - couldn't help it)
customer_reviews.author: CherryHillLady

customer_reviews.title: Best food mix in ever.
customer_reviews.text: Well we had problem with our puppies finish their meal at supper. Not no more, they see me put meal mixer's in their food, use a little warm water and mix with their food. Now they stay by their bowl and do not leave till all gone. They even lick it clean. When I prepare the dinner for them they get excited and bark till they get it. When I put it down they jump and dance till it is on the floor. We recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: hamerjk

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Treat, Too!
customer_reviews.text: My dog (55 lbs.) is highly treat motivated and also a picky eater. Meal Mixers work for her in both cases. These are expensive so I don’t use them as a nutritional supplement; it’s just a little something to pique her interest and that little can go a long way. The pieces are soft and super easy to shred, which is how I get a lot of mileage out of them. For her meals, I break up 3 pieces by rubbing them between two fingers for a few seconds and then mixing it in with her kibble. For training, I tear a piece apart with my nails and can still quickly reward her while keeping her caloric intake reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL FOOD TOPPER!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! I own (more accurately am owned by) a small shitzu mix. Poppy is the fussiest, pickiest eater imaginable. However, just 3 or 4 of these little fluffy chicken balls, crumbled up in her kibble... and voila... she finishes the bowl completely! Amazing! Admittedly, I do add a dash of warm water and a few shreds of organic cheese. However, this is nothing compared to hours spent carefully cooking organic chicken broth with minced organic chicken... which she would reluctantly pick at. If you have a picky-eater, this just might do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Loves Them But Whoa....STINKY!
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't like these at all because OMG the STINK!! However the dog loves them which I guess is the point right? I crumbled them over her food when we switched her over to a different brand of dog food - it made the new food more enticing. I tried to use as training treats but they are so stinky the dogs could smell them in my hand and wouldn't focus on anything else! They were recommended by our breeder.
customer_reviews.author: trulyblessedmama

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater Issue Solved!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the video, my dog loves this stuff. My groomer recommended it after I told him my dog was a picky eater. I don’t use a whole nugget every day because that would break my bank. What I do is pinch off a small amount from a nugget and crumble it up very finely in with my dog’s regular food, mix it up a little and serve. A whole bag of this stuff should last me a long time doing it this way. I have the chicken flavor and when it runs out will try one of the other flavors. So far, this product has solved my picky dog eater issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne markijohn

customer_reviews.title: Stella & Chewy’s Freeze-Dried pellets are Like CATNIP For DOGS!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC PRODUCT 👍🏻👍🏻 Great as a Food topper or treats! I pet sit many regular clients of all different breeds. Mealtime can be challenging, they all want to know what the other pups are eating and then their are the grazers. So, after all food bowls are prepared with pups regular diet, I give each pup a freeze dried pellet. The pups then watch me crumble 2 pellets on top of their prepared food bowl...FEEDING PROBLEMS COMPLETELY GONE!!! Everyone eats/wants their food and even the grazers eat most if not all their food in one sitting. I have the 95% protein varieties on auto refills.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: Very glad i bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use this in place of my normal dog treats. My girls are older and it seemed like everything was upsetting their stomachs. I have one dog that is so picky about food (even people food) that she wont eat for a daysif she doesnt like it, so when i saw it was for picky eaters i wanted to see if it stood the test. It does! I crumble up the little nuggets to make it easier as they dont have all their teeth anymore and they are small dogs. They both go bonkers. Im so glad i decided to buy these. Simply ingredients, they dont smell and are very soft and break apart easily. Healthier treats too.
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: Start them very slowly.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 schnauzers. One inhales her food (have a slow feeder for her) Another one is picky, always has been but, I add other things into his food like, boiled ground chicken or beef or venison, he approaches Stella's slowly and now and then ignores it. My 3rd one has thrown it up several times so, had her on chicken and rice for a bit and, re-introducing little portions to her food, of Stella's. Been good last couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: great treat or supplement
customer_reviews.text: my new 1.5 lb pup loves these mixed with her soft food, my 3.5 lb 8 mo old chi also loves them and will try to "steal" them from the new pup, they are easy to feed, easy to eat , well received and healthy for my chihuahuas, my breeder recommended them and even my vet approves of them, thank you stella and chewy for creating this great product i will cotinue to purchase them in the future
customer_reviews.author: rn4Yeshua

customer_reviews.title: My babies looove these
customer_reviews.text: My 3 fur babies weren’t eating as much as I thought they should. They looove these meal mixers. They stand at their bowls until we crush and mix a little of this in and then they go to town!
customer_reviews.author: OhSondra

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater Now Eats His Kibble
customer_reviews.text: We’ve giving this to our dog for a few years now. He absolutely loves his “toppers”. We leave a few whole pieces, and crumble the rest and mix into his food. Our cats love it too and get it as treat. We feed him mainly the chicken or turkey. The beef didn’t agree with him. Nothing serious,. We just avoid beef now. He’s 9 and still very active. His skin and coat have improved a lot too. If you’ve never fed raw to your dog, start slowly. Their digestive system needs to adjust a little. Any new food should be introduced gradually. Yes, it’s expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CAshopper

customer_reviews.title: Like Crack for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pomachon loves to eat (snacks) and this must taste incredible because he goes nuts over this - like he would with fresh sausage or steak. You know that look in their eye when their natural instincts take over their training. Also use to sprinkle on his dry dog food when we need him to eat right away.
customer_reviews.author: Candrew

customer_reviews.title: Better and healthier than home made food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food ever and has the most premium quality ingredients.! There isn’t another product out there that can even come close to the amazing ingredient in this food! Great for traveling because it freeze dried. Great for treats too. It’s more expensive than other products but the ingredients is so amazing that it’s well worth it for all the health benefits that your dog will experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doggie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this!!! He’s a picky eater too, (Papillon-around 7lbs.) I use it as an add on because he does get an upset stomach if I only feed this to him. Mix with hard food. Discovered they have dinner dust and switched to this product to sprinkle on his food. Definitely add a bit of warm water to “rehydrate” for easier digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: Great as a treat
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the bag my Yorkie Bella sniffed and then took a small bite and the rest is history. She loves this!! I crumble up three or four pellets and put them in her food and she stands on her hind legs and can’t wait for me to put the dish down. I do believe she has more energy, well worth the price to see her this happy
customer_reviews.author: Austin B. Nute

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for hiking ! My malamute loves it - super high in protein !
customer_reviews.text: My Malamute loves this stuff !! She is on a prescription diet and this makes her food more tasty while amping up the protein content - good as she is a highly active / athletic dog An added bonus - its perfect if you are going on a multi day hiking trip ! Its super light and a whole lot easier to carry around than kibble, especially when you have a big dog who eats a ton . This can be the only food they eat , or mixed in with kibble .
customer_reviews.author: flexiest

customer_reviews.title: Why Can't Humans Have Tasty Things That Are Good For Them?
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is a picky eater, but she thinks S&C is a treat. The other dog is a senior. If I feed her, even a little S&C, within an hour, she has the energy of a puppy. My husband asked me not to give them S&C at night because it "winds them up." I feel good knowing that I am pumping nutrition into them. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark James

customer_reviews.title: Last 2 orders were 50% powder...not chunks...and you want chunks if you are using for dog training treats
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but my last two orders...half the product at the bottom... has been powder...not chunks of beef treats. The product should be 100% chunks but IF it gets smashed during logistics...the chunks turn to powder... and powder doesn't work for dog training treats (which is why I use this product.) So...now I buy local (not on Amazon) and the bag is pure "chunky" treats...which is what I want when I am spending this much $$ on a dog treat product.
customer_reviews.author: travel usa

customer_reviews.title: This made my dog sick!
customer_reviews.text: This made my dog sick! Throwing up and bad diarrhea. I introduced it slowly and only bought it because Instinct Raw Boosters (what he normally gets) was out of stock due the pandemic. No, No, NO! I had to rush an order of Instinct Raw Boosters the second they came back into stock! This is going into the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Bambi SloanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tiny puppy loves this
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 week old puppy weighted only 1 pound 2 ounces and we were desperate to find something she liked. This was and still is her very favorite topper for her canned puppy food as well as kibble! Hoping our local Natural Dog Food shop starts selling it soon. IF anyone has a fussy eater, this stuff is a must in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita E. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Dry & Hard Nuggets - Questionable Quality - one time or regular problem?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying the Stella & Chewy meal mixers locally for our picky eaters for about a year and thought I’d buy them online for convenience. The chicken flavor bag that I bought last month was as expected, but this month I bought the beef flavor and found the nuggets to be hard, dry, and not easily crumbled as I like to do over their kibble. Too bad! Was it an old bag, a one time incident, or a regular problem... who knows? I hesitate to buy mixers online again... my girls deserve fresh and tasty food, and I don’t want to waste $$.
customer_reviews.author: Carole H

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't eat dry food without it
customer_reviews.text: My dog and my roommate's dog don't particularly care for dry dog food, and won't eat it without mixing something in it. I have tried wet food... only eats it sporadically. I have tried mixing in treats... has no effect. I have tried other mix-ins.... won't go near it. I crush up 2-3 of the mixers and they devour their dry food! So happy I found this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food ever
customer_reviews.text: Best dog food ever. My Maltese loves it, she does not have bad breath or tartar anymore, her hair looks amazingly bright and soft. Her poop does not smell as bad as before, and it is dry. She is so used to this health diet that I cant give her any other dog food or treats or she will feel sick and have diarrhea. I have been feeding her with this food for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Invictus BarberShop

customer_reviews.title: Your dog might like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My two picky eaters would not eat it when I put it on top of their food so I tried just to put some in a bowl by itself and one did eat it, I think she enjoy it!! the other one just refused to eat it. I was trying to find something that would help them enjoy they dry food. I'm sorry this didn't work.☹😒🤨
customer_reviews.author: WALKER

customer_reviews.title: My dog goes nuts for these
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like crack for dogs. My dog is not a motivated eater, but if I sprinkle this on his food he goes nuts for it. I like that they are already bite size as I was buying the wafers and breaking them up before. I will even break up these into smaller bites to use as treats for training. I love knowing he is getting high quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two bags - both not good :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last week. When we got it, it looked "old" or maybe had been exposed to humidity? It was darker and harder than it should be and smelled stronger than usual. I immediately requested a replacement. We received a new bag and it was exactly the same. Now I am just getting my money back and I will shop elsewhere for my dog's food, where I can get it fresh and safe for him.
customer_reviews.author: CiCiBaby

customer_reviews.title: I'm doing right by my dog
customer_reviews.text: It always bothered me the idea of giving my dog the same dry food all the time. This stuff is great. Pure protein. She eats it up right away. I mix it in with other grain free food to make it stretch. I like that she eats immediately when I put the food down now that I use this great quality food topper by Stellas.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Summervill

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater. I bought this To add to his kibble. It’s very easy to mash (with the back of a spoon). I add a few of these mashed cubes to his kibble and add water to make like a gravy with it - he gobbles it up. I also on a occasion give him one or two as a treat, which he loves. He went CRAZY the first time this stuff was delivered and I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: BLY

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering chicken next time...
customer_reviews.text: I get these freeze dried meal mixers to crush over my senior dogs food to encourage her to eat. This flavor (duck) was harder to crush (maybe because duck is fattier idk). It didn't break apart when crushed, it just kinda flattened and then had to be picked apart. I'll be ordering chicken next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they love them
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using these as treats for training. They are nice as we have a big and small dog (boxer and pug) so not too small for the big dog and I can cut them in half without them disintegrating if they are too big for the pug. Both dogs really enjoy them and I like the fact that the ingredient list is very nice, they are not too hard, not too soft and my pockets aren't full of crumbs or grease at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: glouise

customer_reviews.title: My dog is obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My dog is obsessed with this product. We've tried beef, turkey & chicken & she loves all of them! She used to eat her food a while after it was put out, she now begs for her meals. We still use a dry dog food, but break 3 or so pellets over it & the meal is gone as soon as it is placed on front of her
customer_reviews.author: Mere

product_meta.title: Stella & Chewy's Freeze-Dried Raw Stella's Super Beef Meal Mixers Grain-Free Dog Food Topper
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:8-OunceEvery pet parent wants wholesome, natural nutrition for their pet. Stella & Chewy's raw diets focus on pure ingredients and raw protein so you can feed them as nature intended. At Stella & Chewy's we believe that pure raw nutrition fed in its natural state is the best way to help your pet thrive. Our limited ingredient recipes are simple and pure. Each batch of Meal Mixers starts with 95% or more meat, organs and bone and is often a single source of animal protein, the perfect solution for pets with food sensitivities. Each protein is grass-fed, cage-free or wild caught to guarantee your pet is eating as nature intended. All of the produce in our recipes are 100% organic certified, grown by farmers we trust. Our all-natural recipes are crafted with care in our own USA kitchen to provide the highest levels of protein rich meat and quality grain-free nutrition for your pet, as if they were in the wild. In the Stella & Chewy's kitchen, we take time to craft each recipe in small batches from the world's finest ingredients. All of our ingredients are responsibly sourced.
feature_bullets: Perfect for picky eaters! Add a scoop of Meal Mixers dog food topper to dry food or kibble for a raw boost of nutrition & taste. Your dog will love Chewy's Chicken Meal Mixers’ 95% cage-free chicken, organs and bone plus organic fruits & veggies
Made in the USA – each small batch of Meal Mixers freeze-dried raw dog food toppers is crafted in Stella & Chewy’s own USA kitchen. All ingredients are responsibly sourced, and always made in the USA

All natural and minimally processed. Because the closer foods stay to their natural state, the better they are for your pet. Meal Mixers freeze-dried raw dog food contains NO added hormones, antibiotics, grains, peas, lentils or potatoes. And is 100% complete and balanced for all life stages
Raw nutrition and convenience - It’s easier than ever to give your pet real raw nutrition with the convenience of freeze-dried. No rehydration or preparation necessary. Simply scoop, mix and serve
Supports better health for your pet with improved appetite and digestion, relief from allergies, shiny skin and coat, healthy teeth and gums, increased energy and stamina, and healthy immune system
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE on "Ships from and sold by Amazon.com" items. Questions? Contact Stella & Chewy's at 888-477-8977
